en: Blessed is every one that feareth Jehovah, That walketh in his ways.
hmr: LALPA ṭî taphawt chu an hamṭha ie, A lampui hrawtuhai chu.

en: For thou shalt eat the labor of thy hands: Happy shalt thou be, and it shall be well with thee.
hmr: I kut sininrim ra chu i fâk ding a ni sih a, Lâwmtakin um i ta, thawvengin um bawk i tih.

en: Thy wife shall be as a fruitful vine, In the innermost parts of thy house; Thy children like olive plants, Round about thy table.
hmr: I nuhmei chu i in sûng rila chun, grêp hrui ra nuomtak angin um a ta, I nauhai chu i dâwkân vêla chun oliv kakhai angin um an tih.

en: Behold, thus shall the man be blessed That feareth Jehovah.
hmr: Ngai ta, LALPA ṭî mi chu, Chuong ang chun malsâwmin um an tih.

en: Jehovah bless thee out of Zion: And see thou the good of Jerusalem all the days of thy life.
hmr: LALPA chun Ziona inthawkin malsâwm a ti che: Chuongchun, i dam sûng po chun Jerusalem ṭhatna chu hmûng i tih.

en: Yea, see thou thy children’s children. Peace be upon Israel.
hmr: Anih, i tuhai chu la hmûng i ta; Israelhai chunga chun thlamuongna um raw se.
